meanings.definition: Thiazoles: a class of organic compounds containing a five-membered ring with sulfur and nitrogen atoms.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the properties of thiazoles in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician analyzed the thiazoles under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The thiazoles in the experiment decided to throw a sulfur and nitrogen party in the ring.
meanings.sent4: The thiazoles formed a tight bond like sulfur and nitrogen in a five-membered ring.
meanings.sent5: The unique structure of thiazoles with sulfur and nitrogen makes them stand out in the compound world.
